text: Tapeugah bak jih haba Nabi Noh Nasehat nyang jroh keu jih geupeugah Geukheun bak kawomgeuh hai kawomlon Meu tapike lon sang brat sileupah ! Tinggai lon sinoe bak gata sang brat Lom lonpeuingat dum ayat Allah Teuma bak Tuhan lon lonpeujok droe Mupakat jinoe peue nyang tapeugah Mupakat bandum ngon rakan gata Bek na rahsia teuma takeubah Lheuh ban tapubuet laju ateuhlon Tawakai di lon keudeh keu Alah Bek tameutanggoh teuma le ngon lon
